summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Le Gros Arbre restaurant website. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI loads correctly with proper navigation, menu display, and reservation form. Minor accessibility warnings in mobile navigation component.

accessibility_warnings.issue: DialogContent requires DialogTitle for screen reader accessibility
accessibility_warnings.details: Radix UI dialog component needs proper title or VisuallyHidden wrapper

passed_tests: GET /api/menu returns all 4 categories with items
GET /api/reviews returns customer reviews including Noémie Asfaux and Antoine S
GET /api/info returns correct restaurant info (name, phone: 07 65 87 29 34, rating: 4.4/5, 558 reviews)
GET /api/available-times returns lunch and dinner time slots
Hero section displays with correct rating badge (4.4/5 - 558 avis)
Navigation links scroll to correct sections (menu, reservation)
Menu section loads with 4 categories (Entrées, Plats, Desserts, Boissons)
Reservation form opens with date picker, time selector, guest count
Contact section shows correct phone number (07 65 87 29 34)
Mobile responsive navigation works with hamburger menu
All form fields are present and functional
